TextBody:
Hello,

The command to manually update the policy via CLI currently does not exist.
As an alternative you can restart the Epp client process with the command below.
sudo service epp-client-daemon restart

Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
